name: devinnov8
description: This is a full-stack web application that allows users to perform three core functionalities: 1. **Take Website Screenshots**: Enter a URL and capture a screenshot of the website. 2. **Generate Random User Data**: Dynamically generate random user profiles based on input count. 3. **Generate PDF with QR Code**: Enter any data and generate a PDF file containing a QR code.
author: Debasis Khamari
